name: crypto-booking-server
description: Nodejs server to sign room offers and manage bookings.

scripts.test: rimraf .nyc_output && GIT_REV=`git rev-parse --short HEAD` NODE_ENV=test ./node_modules/.bin/nyc --reporter=text ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha test/**/*.spec.js --timeout 20000
scripts.deploy: now --team windingtree --token $NOW_TOKEN --local-config=now-mainnet.json -e GIT_REV -e BOOKING_POC_ADDRESS -e WHITELIST -e SERVER_PORT -e STARTING_BLOCK -e MONGODB_URI -e MAIL_API_KEY -e FROM_EMAIL -e OWNER_PRIVATE_KEY -e OWNER_ADDRESS -e WEB3_PROVIDER -e RECAPTCHA_SECRET -e MASTER_KEY -e LIF_TOKEN_ADDRESS -e INITIAL_DATE -e FINAL_DATE
scripts.deploy-ropsten: now --team windingtree --token $NOW_TOKEN --local-config=now-qa.json -e GIT_REV -e BOOKING_POC_ADDRESS=$BOOKING_POC_ADDRESS_ROPSTEN -e WHITELIST -e SERVER_PORT -e STARTING_BLOCK -e MONGODB_URI=$MONGODB_URI_QA -e MAIL_API_KEY -e FROM_EMAIL -e OWNER_PRIVATE_KEY=$OWNER_PRIVATE_KEY_ROPSTEN -e OWNER_ADDRESS=$OWNER_ADDRESS_ROPSTEN -e WEB3_PROVIDER=$WEB3_PROVIDER_ROPSTEN -e RECAPTCHA_SECRET -e MASTER_KEY=$MASTER_KEY_ROPSTEN -e LIF_TOKEN_ADDRESS=$LIF_TOKEN_ADDRESS_ROPSTEN -e INITIAL_DATE -e FINAL_DATE
